MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Singer Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.07pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.06pm on the 26th of January 2021.
